regen.new_specification: The system shall recover data from backup in case of data loss or corruption during Archival Storage transfers.

regen.absent_element: restoration of data after disaster recovery
regen.new_specification: The system shall restore the data from backup after a disaster, ensuring minimal loss of information and rapid return to operational state.
The system shall provide a detailed recovery process to restore data from backups in case of disaster or data corruption.

label: disaster recovery capabilities including data recovery
